description: Perform object detection on images using JigsawStack's Object Detection Model,         capable of image grounding, segmentation and computer use.

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

inputs.name: prompts
inputs.info: The prompts to ground the object detection model.                 You can pass a list of comma-separated prompts to extract different information from the image.

inputs.name: url
inputs.info: The image URL. Not required if file_store_key is specified.

inputs.name: file_store_key
inputs.info: The key used to store the image on Jigsawstack File Storage. Not required if url is specified.

inputs.name: annotated_image
inputs.info: If true, will return an url for annotated image with detected objects.

inputs.name: features
inputs.info: Select the features to enable for object detection

inputs.name: return_type
inputs.info: Select the return type for the object detection results such as masks or annotations.
